name: The Sun Never Sets (itch)
description:
THE YEAR IS 1934.

THE BRITISH EMPIRE IS AT ITS STRONGEST EVER.

BUT WHEN ALIENS INVADED ONE OF OUR PACIFIC ISLANDS,

OUR ABILITY TO SAY THAT REALLY COOL LINE,

"THE SUN NEVER SETS ON THE BRITISH EMPIRE," WAS JEOPARDIZED.

YOU ARE THE ONLY FIGHTER PILOT STATIONED ON THIS ISLAND.

UNFORTUNATELY, YOUR PLANE ISN'T EQUIPPED WITH ANY WEAPONS.

GET CREATIVE, CADET.

Mechanic: The and Their Trusty

Theme: The Sun Won't Set
